<a id="class_ResourceImporterBMFont"></a>

# ResourceImporterBMFont

**Inherits:** [ResourceImporter](class_resourceimporter.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Imports a bitmap font in the BMFont (``.fnt``) format.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The BMFont format is a format created by the [BMFont](https://www.angelcode.com/products/bmfont/) program. Many BMFont-compatible programs also exist, like [BMGlyph](https://www.bmglyph.com/).

Compared to [ResourceImporterImageFont](class_resourceimporterimagefont.md), **ResourceImporterBMFont** supports bitmap fonts with varying glyph widths/heights.

See also [ResourceImporterDynamicFont](class_resourceimporterdynamicfont.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Bitmap fonts - Using fonts](../tutorials/ui/gui_using_fonts.md#bitmap-fonts)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_ResourceImporterBMFont_property_compress"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **compress** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_ResourceImporterBMFont_property_compress)

If ``true``, uses lossless compression for the resulting font.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ResourceImporterBMFont_property_fallbacks"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Array](class_array.md) **fallbacks** = `[]` [ðŸ”—](#class_ResourceImporterBMFont_property_fallbacks)

List of font fallbacks to use if a glyph isn't found in this bitmap font. Fonts at the beginning of the array are attempted first.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_ResourceImporterBMFont_property_scaling_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](class_int.md) **scaling_mode** = `2` [ðŸ”—](#class_ResourceImporterBMFont_property_scaling_mode)

Font scaling mode.
